name: 2020 ICCBES-International Conference on Business, Education and Social Sciences
content: Climate change is now affecting every country on every continent. It is disrupting national economies and affecting lives, costing people, communities and countries dearly today and even more tomorrow. Weather patterns are changing, sea levels are rising, weather events are becoming more extreme and greenhouse gas emissions are now at their highest levels in history. Without action, the worldâ€™s average surface temperature is likely to surpass 3 degrees centigrade this century. It is an issue that requires solutions that need to be coordinated at the international level to help developing countries move toward a low-carbon society. International Conference on Business, Education and Social Science (ICCBES) will take place from 6th-8th in Fukuoka, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not and have not been submitted / published / under consideration in other conferences and journals.
